newsitem.title: JAPAN: Taito Co to buy back up to 549,000 shares.
newsitem.headline: Taito Co to buy back up to 549,000 shares.

text.p: Taito Co Ltd, a major sugar refiner affiliated with Mitsui & Co Ltd, said on Friday that it had decided to buy back up to 549,000 of its own shares to introduce a stock option scheme.
The maximum amount to be spent on the repurchase is 300 million yen, it said.
The decision needs the approval of a shareholders' meeting on June 27.
Stock options will be offered to 13 directors and 264 high-ranking employees after the meeting.
The upper limit is 165,000 shares for directors and 384,000 shares for other employees.
The shares will be bought back between April 1, 1998, and June 26, 2000.
